message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE. 

This paper is about creating a standard Persian NER dataset, which is a subfield of natural language processing (NLP). The most relevant sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language), which covers NLP and related areas. cs.IR (Information Retrieval) is also relevant as NER is often used as a preprocessing step for information retrieval tasks. cs.LG (Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) are also possible sub-categories as machine learning and AI techniques are often used in NER research. Finally, cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) is a less likely sub-category, but still possible as neural networks are often used in NER systems.
